location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Letter from the Assistant Resident, Arnold Burrowes Kemball, on board the Sloop Clive, Bushire Roads, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf'

mods.abstract: Letter from the Assistant Resident, Arnold Burrowes Kemball , on board the Sloop Clive, Bushire Roads, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, reporting on relations with the maritime tribes in the Gulf and on his trip to the Trucial States.
